column4: hi all! apt-get updates ignores several repos in my sources.list-what might be the prob?
pastebin the sources.list
standard sources-list added launchpad
well so does it give any errors?
ill paste u the apt-get update output  ... mom
http://pastebin.ca/1264355    apt-get update output
the only weird thing i see there is "Hole:1 http://ppa.launchpad.net intrepid Release [27,6kB]"
its german means like fetch
ah, oops
but then so many repos ignored-why?
then i see nothing at all wrong... if it's the "ign"s you're worried about, those are normal
they are simply saying that nothing in that repository has changed since last time you updated
but those ign leave me with those repos unable to update
because there's nothing to update
ok, i tried to install amarok2 which is in the launchpad-repo, but adept wouldnt find it
that ppa line doesn't look very right to me, what does it say in sources.list?
the package name for amarok 2 testing in that repo seems to be "amarok-kde4"
i know, >invalid operation
hmm? what does it say exactly?
well, from de to en like operation not valid,
ok what did you type though
